name: I Love You (lcivita99)
description:
DOES NOT RUN ON SAFARI ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ SOUND ON POR FAVOR WASD / MOUSE

(pls don't use arrow keys)

You are a lost child in a supermarket! You concoct but one strategy to find them -- to listen for the sound of their familiar toot. What comes next in your harmonious journey, only YOU can find out!

Credits:

Infinite thanks to the wonderful Justin Michael Cook for the magnificent contributions in game conceptualization, 3D modeling (amongst other asset production), and sound design. I love you.
